name: Spa Recovery Himalayan Bath Salt (With Essential Oils), Glass Bottle
description:
Sourced from the foothills of the Himlayas in Pakistan, these salts will add a spa-like quality to any bath or hot tub and can even be used as a rejuvenating foot soak. Containing 84 minerals including magnesium, calcium, phosphorus and iron (which gives the salt its unique pink colour) these salts will offer you a relaxing experience that can help replenish skin giving a natural glow.
 

We offer our Himalayan Salt infused with a delightful blend of essential oils. This revitalizing combination includes eucalyptus, peppermint, rosemary, orange, citronella, aniseed, and thyme essential oils.
additionalInfoDescription1:
Ingredients: Sodium chloride (Himalayan salt), essential oils of eucalyptus, peppermint, rosemary, orange, citronella, aniseed, and thyme.

300g
additionalInfoDescription2: How to use: Add a generous amount (about 1-2 tablespoons) of the bath salt to warm, running water. Allow the salts to dissolve for approximately 5 minutes before getting in and enjoying a long, relaxing soak
additionalInfoDescription3: Caution: For external use only. Not for use on mucous membranes, irritated or broken skin. If irritation occurs stop bathing, discontinue use and rinse with water. If irritation persists, seek medical advice. Always seek medical advice from a doctor before use if pregnant, breastfeeding or have very sensitive skin. Keep away from eyes, if in eyes rinse well with water. Do not eat or ingest. Keep out of reach of children.
additionalInfoDescription4:
SHIPPING INFO

FREE Standard UK Delivery on orders over £30
Spend over £30 and receive free delivery dispatched and takes 3 - 5 working days.


Standart Delivery.
3 - 5 working days.

Express Delivery.
1 - 2 working days.

We always aim to dispatch orders within 2 working days but at busier times this can become longer.

name: English Pear & Spices Reed Diffuser 100ml
description:
Our luxury diffuser collection made with essential oils and fine fragrances add a sense of magic to any space.
 

Rich, fresh and sweet top notes of ripe pear and dessert wine, give way to subtle spicy undertones of cinnamon and nutmeg.
 

Top: Green Pear, Brown Sugar, Apple

Middle: Coconut, Cinnamon, Nutmeg

Base: Musk, Orange, Peppermint

An alcohol-free, non-flammable natural vegetable base, fragrance oils.
Natural Reeds, Recycled Amber Glass
100ml
additionalInfoDescription1:
Made with an alcohol-free, non-flammable natural vegetable base which has been blended with top quality essential or fragrance oils to make rooms smell amazing. Each kit comes with 10 natural rattan reed sticks.

To release the aroma, take out the stopper, and place the rattan reed sticks in the bottle. Allow the oil to be naturally drawn up the tiny capillaries in the sticks. The oil will last longer if placed in a cooler part of the room; if a diffuser is placed near a source of heat or in sunlight, it will evaporate quite quickly.
 

Natural Reeds,  Recycled Amber Glass
100ml
additionalInfoDescription2:
FREE Standard UK Delivery on orders over £30
Spend over £30 and receive free delivery dispatched and takes 3 - 5 working days.

Standard Delivery
3 - 5 working days.

Express Delivery
1-2 working days.
 

We always aim to dispatch orders within 2 working days but at busier times this can become longer.
